about_the_game:
Introduction to Cannonball Crew

Cannonball Crew is a fast-paced, action-packed, pirate-themed game that blends the excitement of capture the flag with a thrilling treasure hunt.

Objective of the Game

In this competitive third-person multiplayer game, two teams of pirates face off in a battle for treasure. The goal is to gather and secure as many treasures as possible. The team with the highest total on their side of the map at the end of the match claims victory.

Gameplay Flow

The match begins with a chaotic scramble as everyone rushes to the center of the field to seize treasure chests placed along the border. Once collected, each team must hide their treasures within their territory and prepare to defend them. The game then shifts to a high-stakes battle as players race to steal the opponents' hidden treasures while protecting their own.

Capturing and Imprisoning Opponents

Players can capture and imprison opponents who trespass on their territory, earning valuable hints that reveal the location of one of the enemy's hidden treasures.

Rescuing Teammates

However, captured teammates can also be rescued by sneaking into the enemy’s base and cutting them loose from jail. Free your teammates to keep your team’s full potential in the pursuit of victory!

Weapons and Combat Mechanics

  • Sword: Wield your sword to fend off enemies who attempt to capture or attack you as you make daring attempts to steal their treasure.

  • Harpoon: Use the harpoon to snag enemies, pulling them closer for a swift strike, or to launch yourself toward treasures and obstacles.

  • Cannon: Fire an explosive cannon to clear your path and send foes flying!

Teamwork and Strategy

The dynamic gameplay encourages strategy, teamwork, and quick reflexes. Success depends on effective collaboration, clever planning, and adaptability.

Dynamic Pirate Adventure

Immerse yourself in an intense pirate adventure where every moment is filled with action, strategy, and the thrill of competition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Cannonball Crew is a fast-paced pirate multiplayer game blending capture-the-flag and treasure hunting. Teams scramble to seize treasures, hide them, and defend their stash. Imprison opponents, rescue teammates, and wield swords, harpoons, and cannons in this intense battle for pirate glory!
